grafana.name: Grafana
grafana.deleteTips: Are you sure you want to delete the Grafana server

create.name: Name
create.nameDesc: Please input the name of this Grafana server.
create.urlDesc: Please provide the URL of the Grafana server. Or follow this guide to create a server with Amazon Grafana service.
create.tokenDesc: Please provide the token for the solution to access the Grafana server. Follow this guide to create a server with Amazon Grafana service.
create.dataSourcePermission: Check Grafana data source creation permission

engine.descOpenSearch: An AWS-managed service run and scale OpenSearch clusters, providing fast access and query on log data.
engine.descLightEngine: An interactive query service that makes it easy to analyze data directly in S3 using standard SQL.

create.sampleDashboardDesc: Create a predefined sample dashboard in a Grafana dashboard.
create.centralBucketDesc: You can select a S3 location to stored the partitioned logs.
create.centralTableDesc: The name of the table used to store logs.
create.logProcessorExpDesc: Enter a value and the unit of time to run the schedule. For more information and examples, see <0 href="{{- link}}" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">{{- link}}</0>
create.logMergerExpDesc: The expression that defines when the LogMerger runs. For more information and examples, see <0 href="{{- link}}" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">{{- link}}</0>
create.logArchiveExpDesc: The expression that defines when the logArchive runs. For more information and examples, see <0 href="{{- link}}" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">{{- link}}</0>
create.logMergerAgeDesc: The number of days to merge objects in log bucket, default setting 7 days.
create.logArchiveAgeDesc: The number of days to archive objects in log bucket, default setting 30 days.
create.errorLogArchiveAgeGteOne: Log archive age should be greater or equal to 1 day
create.errorLogArchiveAgeGteLogMergerAge: Log merge time should be less than log archive time
create.errorLogMergerAgeGteOne: Log merger age should be greater or equal to 1 day
create.errorLogProcessorScheduleExp: Log processor schedule should be more than 1 minute.
